member.name: T:Synthesys.Plugins.Dummy.DummyAction
member.summary: This plugin does not do meaningful work and is meant to be an example for future Extension development.

member.name: P:Synthesys.Plugins.Dummy.DummyAction.ConfigurationOption
member.summary: Arbitrary configuration option in string format

member.name: P:Synthesys.Plugins.Dummy.DummyAction.ConfigurationOption2
member.summary: Arbitrary configuration option in integer format, deserialized from a string

member.name: P:Synthesys.Plugins.Dummy.DummyAction.Tasks
member.summary: Link to the Task toolbox, which can queue Tasks

member.name: P:Synthesys.Plugins.Dummy.DummyAction.Host
member.summary:
Hostname/IP acted upon by the ActionExtension
This property will only be populated if the ActionExtension is queued with a hostname as a Target. If no compatible Targets were found, this will remain null.

member.name: P:Synthesys.Plugins.Dummy.DummyAction.HttpService
member.summary:
HTTP service acted upon by the ActionExtension
This property will only be populated if the ActionExtension is queued with an HTTP service as a Target. If no compatible Targets were found, this will remain null.
This property provides an a more concrete implementation of ServicePortArtifact, which means if a Target is identified as an HTTP server, that Target will be referenced from both this property and the "Service" property below.

member.name: P:Synthesys.Plugins.Dummy.DummyAction.Service
member.summary:
Service acted upon by the ActionExtension, addressed via its port
This property will only be populated if the ActionExtension is queued with an open port (service) as a Target. If no compatible Targets were found, this will remain null.
If a more concrete implementation is not matched (for example, because the service was not fingerprinted), the property with the closest parent Type will be referenced.

member.name: T:Synthesys.Plugins.Dummy.DummyReaction
member.summary: This plugin does not do meaningful work and is meant to be an example for future Extension development.

member.name: P:Synthesys.Plugins.Dummy.DummyReaction.Host
member.summary: Hostname/IP which is acted upon by the ReactionExtension. This value is populated by the framework.

member.name: P:Synthesys.Plugins.Dummy.DummyReaction.ProjectPointer
member.summary:
Information about the business elements used to call this ReactionExtension.
This is used to identify what business elements are linked to a technical implementation

member.name: M:Synthesys.Plugins.Dummy.DummyReaction.React(Synthesys.SDK.Triggers.TriggerDescriptor)
member.summary: This method is called when the Extension is popped from the Task Queue and executed
member.param: Trigger causing the ReactionExtension to fire
